verses.verse: בָּנִ֣ים <WH1121> bā·nîm are sons ( Clean and Unclean Animals) ( 30 11:1-47) ;  510 10:9-16 אַתֶּ֔ם 859 Pro-2mp ( ’at·tem) You לַֽיהוָ֖ה 3068 Prep-l│N-proper-ms ( Yah·weh) of the LORD אֱלֹהֵיכֶ֑ם 430 N-mpc│2mp ( ’ĕ·lō·hê·ḵem) your God; לֹ֣א 3808 Adv-NegPrt ( lō) do not תִתְגֹּֽדְד֗וּ 1413 V-Hitpael-Imperf-2mp ( ṯiṯ·gō·ḏə·ḏū) cut וְלֹֽא־ 3808 Conj-w│Adv-NegPrt ( wə·lō-) yourselves תָשִׂ֧ימוּ 7760 V-Qal-Imperf-2mp ( ṯā·śî·mū) or shave קָרְחָ֛ה 7144 N-fs ( qā·rə·ḥāh) בֵּ֥ין 996 Prep ( bên) your foreheads עֵינֵיכֶ֖ם 5869 N-cdc│2mp ( ‘ê·nê·ḵem) ... לָמֵֽת׃ 4191 Prep-l│V-Qal-Prtcpl-ms ( lā·mêṯ) on behalf of the dead,

כִּ֣י <WH3588> kî for עַ֤ם <WH5971> ‘am are a people קָדוֹשׁ֙ <WH6918> qā·ḏō·wōš holy אַתָּ֔ה <WH859> ’at·tāh you לַיהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah·weh to the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֑יךָ <WH430> ’ĕ·lō·he·ḵā your God וּבְךָ֞ Conj-w│Prep│2ms ( ū·ḇə·ḵā) . בָּחַ֣ר 977 V-Qal-Perf-3ms ( bā·ḥar) has chosen יְהוָ֗ה 3068 N-proper-ms ( Yah·weh) The LORD לִֽהְי֥וֹת 1961 Prep-l│V-Qal-Inf ( lih·yō·wṯ) you to be לוֹ֙ Prep│3ms ( lōw) for His לְעַ֣ם 5971 Prep-l│N-msc ( lə·‘am) a people סְגֻלָּ֔ה 5459 N-fs ( sə·ḡul·lāh) prized possession מִכֹּל֙ 3605 Prep-m│N-msc ( mik·kōl) out of all הָֽעַמִּ֔ים 5971 Art│N-mp ( hā·‘am·mîm) the peoples אֲשֶׁ֖ר 834 Pro-r ( ’ă·šer) - עַל־ 5921 Prep ( ‘al-) on פְּנֵ֥י 6440 N-cpc ( pə·nê) the face הָאֲדָמָֽה׃ס 127 Art│N-fs ( hā·’ă·ḏā·māh) of the earth.
לֹ֥א <WH3808> lō You must not תֹאכַ֖ל <WH398> ṯō·ḵal eat כָּל־ <WH3605> kāl- any תּוֹעֵבָֽה׃ <WH8441> tō·w·‘ê·ḇāh detestable thing.

זֹ֥את <WH2063> zōṯ These הַבְּהֵמָ֖ה <WH929> hab·bə·hê·māh are the animals אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> ’ă·šer that תֹּאכֵ֑לוּ <WH398> tō·ḵê·lū you may eat: ( The precise identification of some of the birds and animals in this chapter is uncertain.) שׁ֕וֹר <WH7794> šō·wr The ox, שֵׂ֥ה <WH7716> śêh ... כְשָׂבִ֖ים <WH3775> ḵə·śā·ḇîm the sheep, וְשֵׂ֥ה <WH7716> wə·śêh ... עִזִּֽים׃ <WH5795> ‘iz·zîm the goat,

אַיָּ֥ל <WH354> ’ay·yāl the deer, וּצְבִ֖י <WH6643> ū·ṣə·ḇî the gazelle, וְיַחְמ֑וּר <WH3180> wə·yaḥ·mūr the roe deer, וְאַקּ֥וֹ <WH689> wə·’aq·qōw the wild goat, וְדִישֹׁ֖ן <WH1788> wə·ḏî·šōn the ibex, וּתְא֥וֹ <WH8377> ū·ṯə·’ōw the antelope, וָזָֽמֶר׃ <WH2169> wā·zā·mer and the mountain sheep.

וְכָל־ <WH3605> wə·ḵāl any בְּהֵמָ֞ה <WH929> bə·hê·māh animal מַפְרֶ֣סֶת <WH6536> map̄·re·seṯ ... פַּרְסָ֗ה <WH6541> par·sāh hoof וְשֹׁסַ֤עַת <WH8156> wə·šō·sa·‘aṯ divided שֶׁ֙סַע֙ <WH8157> še·sa‘ that has a split שְׁתֵּ֣י <WH8147> šə·tê in two פְרָס֔וֹת <WH6541> p̄ə·rā·sō·wṯ ... מַעֲלַ֥ת <WH5927> ma·‘ă·laṯ and that chews גֵּרָ֖ה <WH1625> gê·rāh the cud בַּבְּהֵמָ֑ה <WH929> bab·bə·hê·māh ... אֹתָ֖הּ <WH853> ’ō·ṯāh -. תֹּאכֵֽלוּ׃ <WH398> tō·ḵê·lū You may eat

( Or the coney or the hyrax) כִּֽי־ <WH3588> kî- Although מַעֲלֵ֧ה <WH5927> ma·‘ă·lêh chew גֵרָ֣ה <WH1625> ḡê·rāh the cud, הֵ֗מָּה <WH1992> hêm·māh they וּפַרְסָה֙ <WH6541> ū·p̄ar·sāh hoof. לֹ֣א <WH3808> lō they do not הִפְרִ֔יסוּ <WH6536> hip̄·rî·sū have a divided טְמֵאִ֥ים <WH2931> ṭə·mê·’îm are unclean הֵ֖ם <WH1992> hêm They לָכֶֽם׃ Prep│2mp ( lā·ḵem) for you,

וְאֶת־ <WH853> wə·’eṯ- as well as הַ֠חֲזִיר <WH2386> ha·ḥă·zîr the pig; כִּֽי־ <WH3588> kî- ... מַפְרִ֨יס <WH6536> map̄·rîs has a divided פַּרְסָ֥ה <WH6541> par·sāh hoof, הוּא֙ <WH1931> hū though it וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> wə·lō it does not גֵרָ֔ה <WH1625> ḡê·rāh chew the cud. טָמֵ֥א <WH2931> ṭā·mê is unclean ה֖וּא <WH1931> hū It לָכֶ֑ם Prep│2mp ( lā·ḵem) for you. מִבְּשָׂרָם֙ 1320 Prep-m│N-msc│3mp ( mib·bə·śā·rām) its meat לֹ֣א 3808 Adv-NegPrt ( lō) You must not תֹאכֵ֔לוּ 398 V-Qal-Imperf-2mp ( ṯō·ḵê·lū) eat וּבְנִבְלָתָ֖ם 5038 Conj-w, Prep-b│N-fsc│3mp ( ū·ḇə·niḇ·lā·ṯām) its carcass לֹ֥א 3808 Adv-NegPrt ( lō) .... תִגָּֽעוּ׃ס 5060 V-Qal-Imperf-2mp ( ṯig·gā·‘ū) or touch
